short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Bypass web restrictions with one click and copy-paste freely.
short.de: Umgehen Sie Web-Einschränkungen mit einem Klick und kopieren Sie frei.
short.el: Παρακάμψτε τους περιορισμούς του διαδικτύου με ένα κλικ και αντιγράψτε ελεύθερα.
short.es: Evita las restricciones web con un clic y copia-pega libremente.
short.fr: Contournez les restrictions web en un clic et copiez-collez librement.
short.hi: एक क्लिक में वेब प्रतिबंधों को बायपास करें और स्वतंत्र रूप से कॉपी करें।
short.hu: Kerüld meg a webes korlátozásokat egy kattintással, és másolj szabadon.
short.id: Lewati pembatasan web dengan satu klik dan salin-tempel dengan bebas.
short.it: Supera le restrizioni web con un clic e copia-incolla liberamente.
short.ja: ワンクリックでウェブ制限を解除し、自由にコピー＆ペースト。
short.ko: 한 번의 클릭으로 웹 제한을 우회하고 자유롭게 복사하세요.
short.ms: Langkau sekatan web dengan satu klik dan salin dengan bebas.
short.nl: Omzeil webbeperkingen met één klik en kopieer vrij.
short.pl: Omijaj ograniczenia sieci jednym kliknięciem i kopiuj swobodnie.
short.ru: Обходите веб-ограничения одним нажатием и свободно копируйте.
short.sv: Kringgå webbbegränsningar med ett klick och kopiera fritt.
short.th: ข้ามข้อจำกัดเว็บด้วยคลิกเดียวและคัดลอกได้อย่างอิสระ
short.tr: Web kısıtlamalarını tek tıkla aşın ve özgürce kopyalayın.
short.vi: Vượt qua hạn chế web chỉ với một cú nhấp và sao chép tự do.
short.zh_CN: 一键破解网页限制，自由复制粘贴
short.zh_TW: 一鍵破解網頁限制，自由複製貼上

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy Genie is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your web browsing experience. With a simple toggle, you can bypass copy restrictions on websites, allowing you to freely copy and paste content. Whether for study, work, or everyday use, Copy Genie helps you efficiently access the information you need.

Features and Benefits

- Break Through Limitations 🚀: Many websites restrict copying to protect their content. Copy Genie helps you bypass these restrictions effortlessly.

- Boost Efficiency ⏱️: Avoid manual typing or screenshots. Copy text directly and save time and effort.

- User-Friendly Interface 👍: With an intuitive interface, you can easily enable or disable the feature with just one click.

- Safe and Reliable 🔒: Rigorously tested to ensure optimal performance while safeguarding your privacy.

- Multi-Language Support 🌐: Supports multiple languages to cater to users from different regions worldwide.

Why Choose Copy Genie?

- Seamless Integration 🤝: Perfectly compatible with Chrome, without affecting other extensions or browser performance.

- Continuous Updates 🔄: We consistently refine features to keep up with new web technologies and user needs.

- User-Centric Approach 👥: We value user feedback and use it to drive our product improvements.

Install Copy Genie and enjoy unprecedented freedom to copy content with ease!

FAQ

Q: Is Copy Genie safe to use?

A: Absolutely! Copy Genie is rigorously tested to ensure your privacy and security are protected.

Q: How do I enable or disable the extension?

A: Simply click the toggle switch in the extension popup to enable or disable the feature.

Q: Will this extension affect my browser's performance?

A: No, Copy Genie is designed to integrate seamlessly without impacting browser performance.

Q: Can I use Copy Genie on any website?

A: Yes, Copy Genie is designed to work on most websites, allowing you to copy and paste content freely.
